mdRecord.dcterms:title: Needles and suture wire in box
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Charriere [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The words "Collin A Paris" are inscribed inside the lid of the box. This item belonged to Dr. Elie C. Chastang, a 19th century French Navy Doctor; part of a collection of French naval instruments.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
